name: Schematic Bring-Up Assistant
description: Automated PCB bring-up checklist generation from schematic analysis. Detects common design errors and generates step-by-step debugging procedures.
description_full: The Schematic Bring-Up Assistant analyzes your KiCad schematics and automatically generates comprehensive bring-up checklists for PCB debugging. It detects MCUs, power rails, clock sources, reset circuits, and common design mistakes. Perfect for hardware engineers doing first power-on testing.
